pokemon.name: Garchomp
pokemon.description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

pokemon.name: Electivire
pokemon.description: When it gets excited, it thumps its chest. With every thud, thunder roars and electric sparks shower all around.

pokemon.name: charizard
pokemon.description: If Charizard becomes truly angered, the flame at the tip of its tail burns in a light blue shade.

pokemon.name: Serperior
pokemon.description: It can stop its opponents' movements with just a glare

pokemon.name: Samurott
pokemon.description: A master of a sword-drawing art called iaijutsu, Samurott settles its battles with a single swing of either large sword sheathed in its foreleg armor.

pokemon.name: Reshiram
pokemon.description: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather

pokemon.name: Zekrom
pokemon.description: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

pokemon.name: Hydreigon
pokemon.description: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three headed pokemon devours everything in it's path.

pokemon.name: Darkrai
pokemon.description: Folklore has it that on moonless nights, this Pokémon will make people see horrific nightmares.

pokemon.name: Sceptile
pokemon.description: The leaves growing on its back are very sharp edged. This pokemon is very agile-it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind

pokemon.name: Metagross
pokemon.description: Metagross has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This Pokémon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.

pokemon.name: Giritina
pokemon.description: Renegade Pokémon, It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

pokemon.name: Empoleon
pokemon.description: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns

pokemon.name: Scizor
pokemon.description: Scizor has a body with the hardness of steel. It's not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This pokemon flaps it's wings to regulate it's body temperature

pokemon.name: Gardevoir
pokemon.description: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

pokemon.name: Palkia
pokemon.description: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

pokemon.name: Reuniclus
pokemon.description: The multiplying pokemon, They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders physically.

pokemon.name: Beheeyem
pokemon.description: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.

pokemon.name: Bisharp
pokemon.description: No matter how strong the Bisharp, it's said that if the blade on its head is chipped, it will retire from its position as the boss.

pokemon.name: Arceus
pokemon.description: It is described in mythology as the Pokémon that shaped the universe with its 1,000 arms.
